about_the_game:
Demo Features include

The Yesterdreamt DEMO allows players to get a first glimpse of the full game.

  • Explore the first area (of 12 total planned) of Bruocsele: the docks and connecting cave system

  • Collect Conclave cards to unlock 2 spells (out of 16 in the full game), some of which might be hidden

  • Learn how to shoot and move to survive a host of horrors

  • Find and defeat the area boss, to prove yourself as a Gunslinger

  • Experience a first taste of Yesterdreamt's sanity system

Your story in the Worlde of Yesterdreamt

The Eld Riche was torn asunder. From the Inbetween came unspeakable horrors. To survive, humanity drew back into their Burghs. The Land shackles are the only thing keeping them together.

The Thaumaturges, a secretive caste of hooded figures, created the Reverie, a protective ward against the Inbetween. But they needed a power source, and so they appointed the Dreamweavers, who would sleep eternal, to keep us safe.

But now, the Reverie is failing...

You are Folke, Gunslinger in training. After losing your mentor, you're not sure if it's even possible to finish your training. But you have sworn the Creed and taken the oath. So the people of Indringhem are now yours to protect. With an ever-sleeping Dreamweaver as your only company, you must follow the Land Shackles to Brucsele, through the Inbetween.

And bring back salvation.

(Yesterdreamt is developed by a solo dev with some help.)

content_descriptors.notes: Yesterdreamt features cosmic horror and body horror, though rendered in a hand-drawn, comic book style.

name: Yesterdreamt Demo
short_description: In this cosmic horror Metroidvania, become the Gunslinger your people need. Defy an Elder God and bring back salvation. Face countless horrors. Use your steady hand and arcane tricks to stay alive. And above all else, try to stay sane.
